mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu SET cafeId = #{cafeId}, menuName = #{menuName}, price = #{price}, comment = #{comment}, menuPic = #{menuPic}, categoryId = #{categoryId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.menuId, A.menuName, A.price, A.comment, A.menuPic, B.categoryName FROM menu A LEFT JOIN category B ON A.categoryId = B.categoryId WHERE A.cafeId = #{cafeId}
